attributes.review: I used to believe that trump was what America needed but year by year. Month by month my hopes were squashed. I was hoping to find something redeeming when using the app and all I was left with was a more sour taste in my mouth.

attributes.review: I Downloaded this app because I wanted to know more about our president for my project in school. I had a nightmare that night of a huge pickle tick crushing me. That will haunt me forever.
